name: Navia
title: Helm of the Radiant Rose: Navia

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Navia to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Ceremonial Crystalshot
skills.desc: Deals 3 Geo DMG, attaches Geo Infusion to this character. Discard up to 5 Crystal Shrapnel from your Hand. Each card you Discard causes this to deal +1 DMG, and you draw 1 card.

skills.name: As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute
skills.desc: Deals 1 Geo DMG, deals 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby. Summons 1 Rosula Dorata Salute and creates 1 Crystal Shrapnel card before adding it to your Hand.

skills.name: Mutual Assistance Network
skills.desc: (Passive) After an opponent's character takes Crystallize reaction DMG: Create 3 Crystal Shrapnel and randomly place them into your deck.
